summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue South, from Genesee Street to Conover Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7770 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
